Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have the problem that my maneuver nodes don't work. I have my tracking station on level 2, but I can't add maneuver nodes. Can someone please halp me out?

Thank you in advace

-Felix
There's an occasional glitch like this, but unfortunately no fix other than to try switching to another flight or logging out of the game and starting it up again.
you also need mission control to be at level two
